rulesInput.minContrasenia: Password must be at least 8 characters
rulesInput.messageNoExcederCaracteres: Your comment must not exceed 250 characters

labels.agregarComentario: Add a comment to your post

homeUser.lmw: Latin Macro Watch (LMW) is a database of macroeconomic and financial indicators. LMW provides indicators on economic activity, fiscal and external accounts, financial markets, and public debt from official sources. LMW includes historical data beginning in 1990 covering all 26 IDB borrowing member countries.
homeUser.baseDatos: Our database has the option of selecting and downloading indicators and specific periods according to the needs of each user, it can also be fully downloaded in XLS and CSV formats.
homeUser.graficos: Create a dynamic chart with LMW available data.

contactButton.text: Send your comments, questions or suggestions to improve the experience in Latin Macro Watch.
contactButton.contacto: If you want to contact an administrator, send us an e-mail:
contactButton.comentarioEnviado: The comment has been sent successfully!

loginAdmin.instrucciones: Enter your Administrator information to access

confirmDialog.reemplazarText: Are you sure you want to replace the current Database?
confirmDialog.reemplazarText2: By clicking accept, the previous Database will be automatically deleted.

confirmDialog.agregarMessageError: Error: The data could not be added correctly.
confirmDialog.eliminarText: Are you sure you want to delete this Administrator?

confirmDialog.restoreText2: By clicking on accept, the previously  Database will be automatically deleted and the new version will be loaded.

newAdminDialog.correoEnviado: An e-mail has been sent to the new Administrator.

editPaisDialog.text: Select a color for this country
editPaisDialog.actualizarSuccessMessage: Country layout has been updated successfully!

latinMacroWatchDatos.text: Select indicators, periods and countries to visualize in table format. You can add as many indicators as needed. The customized data table can be downloaded.

latinMacroWatchGraficos.text: Select indicators and countries to visualize them in a chart. You can select the time frame and chart type. The customized graph and data can be downloaded.
